Power+Space tags are rarely useful together. COTD: 'middling to weak with Colonies, terrible without' (Krazyguy75). Supplier is strictly better (same energy, 4 steel > 1 Venus step).
Giant Solar Collector.when_to_pick: Only with Colonies when you need energy for trading and Venus synergy. Otherwise skip.

Mohole Excavation.name: Mohole Excavation
Mohole Excavation.economy: 1 steel-prod = 8 MC, 2 heat-prod = 8 MC, 2 heat = ~1 MC. Building tag ~2 MC. Total ~19 MC.
Mohole Excavation.reasoning: Below average. Unfocused production split between steel and heat is underwhelming. 2 heat-prod is weak. COTD (benbever): 'below average value, not very interesting'. Building tag helps slightly. Strictly worse than Mining Operations (which gives 2 steel-prod + 4 steel instead of 1 steel + 2 heat). [CORRECTED: 48/D -> 52/D. Desktop C, 29.6% WR poor]
Mohole Excavation.when_to_pick: Almost never. Only as Helion or if you need Building tag and nothing better exists.

Preservation Program.name: Preservation Program
Preservation Program.economy: 5 TR = 35.5 MC income + 8 MC VP (late) = ~43.5 MC, но потеря ~3-4 TR за игру = -21 to -28 MC. Чистая ценность ~15-22 MC, что ниже среднего для прелюдии (24.5 MC). Без тегов.
Preservation Program.reasoning: Одна из слабейших прелюдий. 5 TR = 5 MC-prod + 5 VP, но при этом ТЕРЯЕШЬ весь будущий TR, что в ~9-gen игре означает потерю 3-4 TR (21-28 MC). benbever: 'Rarely playable, but very strong with Double Down.' shai_aus: 'contest for worst prelude' (в посте о Nitrogen Shipment). Единственный юз-кейс — Double Down (10 TR за 2 прелюдии) или Pristar. Без этих комбо — trap. Нет тегов — дополнительный минус.
Preservation Program.when_to_pick: Только с Double Down (10 TR за 2 прелюдии) или Pristar. В остальных случаях одна из худших прелюдий в игре.

Venus Contract.name: Venus Contract
Venus Contract.economy: 1 TR (7.1 MC) + 1 card (3.5 MC) + Venus тег (2 MC) = ~12.6 MC базово. Эффект -3 MC/Venus raise: нужно 4+ raises для break-even с средней прелюдией. Крайне ситуативно.
Venus Contract.reasoning: Очень слабая прелюдия. 1 TR + 1 Venus card + эффект '-3 MC при Venus raise' = ~10-12 MC базовой ценности (SoupsBane подтверждает). Чтобы выйти на среднюю ценность прелюдии, нужно поднять Venus ~5 раз, что нереалистично без массивного Venus engine. Venus тег — единственный плюс. dfinberg: 'You need 6 more Venus bumps to get to meh.'
Venus Contract.when_to_pick: Только с мощным Venus engine в руке (Aphrodite + Standard Tech + Venus карты). Без комбо — одна из худших прелюдий.

Nobel Prize.name: Nobel Prize
Nobel Prize.economy: 5 MC + 2 VP (= ~10 MC mid-game) + 2 requirement cards (~8 MC from selection) + Wild tag ~2 MC. Total ~25 MC. BUT 2 VP does nothing for gen 1 engine.
Nobel Prize.reasoning: Looks decent on paper but 2 VP on a prelude is terrible — VP does nothing to build your engine early. 5 MC is minimal. The 2 requirement cards are a gamble (might not hit what you need). COTD (icehawk84): 'absolutely horrendous, 2 VP is not something you want in a prelude'. Wild tag is minor consolation.
Nobel Prize.when_to_pick: Almost never. Production preludes are strictly better for gen 1. Only if other options are terrible.

Loan.name: Loan
Loan.economy: 30 MC - 2 MC-prod (= -10 MC gen 1 value). Net ~20 MC. No tags = -3 MC penalty. Total ~17 MC effective.
Loan.reasoning: One of the worst preludes. 30 MC sounds great but -2 MC-prod is brutal in gen 1 — you're cutting into your already thin 20 MC production. COTD (benbever): 'one of the worst preludes in quantified value'. Only justified if the 30 MC enables a game-changing gen 1 play that wouldn't happen otherwise. No tags hurts further. [CORRECTED: 44/D -> 55/C. Desktop B ~18.6MC but 20.6% WR terrible - compromise at C]
Loan.when_to_pick: Only when 30 MC enables a critical gen 1 play (e.g., Io Mining) and you have no better production prelude.

Io Research Outpost.name: Io Research Outpost
Io Research Outpost.economy: 1 ti-prod (14.25 MC) + 1 card (3.5 MC) = 17.75 MC value + теги ~5 MC = ~23 MC. Ниже среднего (24.5 MC). Ti-prod бесполезен без Space карт.
Io Research Outpost.reasoning: Слабая прелюдия с хорошими тегами. 1 ti-prod (14.25 MC) + 1 card (3.5 MC) + Jovian тег (3 MC) + Science тег (3 MC) = ~23.75 MC — на грани средней ценности, но без immediate value. ad_hocNC: 'One of the worst preludes.' icehawk84: 'better than Galilean Mining' за счёт Science тега и карты. FieldMouse007: 'Weak card. Science tag might come handy.' Берут исключительно ради тегов — Science для AI Central/Mass Converter, Jovian для мультипликаторов.
Io Research Outpost.when_to_pick: С Saturn Systems, или когда нужен Science тег для AI Central/Mass Converter, или при стратегии Jovian с мультипликаторами. Обычно — одна из последних прелюдий, которую берёшь.

Applied Science.name: Applied Science
Applied Science.economy: 6 Science ресурсов без Physics Complex = ~6 VP max = ~9.6 MC (VP late). С Physics Complex = 12 VP = ~19.2 MC, но нужно потратить 6 actions. Wild тег = ~8 MC. Итого без combo: ~17.6 MC, с Physics: ~27 MC. Средняя прелюдия = 24.5 MC.
Applied Science.reasoning: Прелюдия с нулевой немедленной ценностью — ни MC, ни production, ни TR в gen 1. 6 Science ресурсов полезны ТОЛЬКО с Physics Complex (потратить 6 → 2 VP per action, до 12 VP) или animal/microbe placement. Без конкретного combo — пустая прелюдия. SimonDinos: 'doesn't generate any advantage, only gives points.' icehawk84 подтверждает — 'underwhelming without Mass Converter/Physics.' Wild тег (~8 MC) частично компенсирует, но gen 1 без денег/production — критический недостаток.
Applied Science.when_to_pick: Только с Physics Complex или массивным Science engine в руке. Без конкретного combo — одна из худших прелюдий, так как gen 1 без ресурсов = фатальная потеря темпа.

Galilean Mining.name: Galilean Mining
Galilean Mining.economy: 2 ti-prod (28.5 MC) - 5 MC cost = 23.5 MC номинально, но ti-prod требует Space карт для использования. Без Space карт = wasted production. Сравни с Business Empire: 6 MC-prod (34.2 MC) - 6 MC = 28.2 MC и гибкость.
Galilean Mining.reasoning: Звучит хорошо (2 ti-prod), но фактически одна из худших прелюдий. -5 MC penalty означает, что начинает отбиваться только с gen 3. icehawk84 рассчитывает: 'Business Empire has quantified value of 21 MC and Galilean Mining only 15 MC.' shai_aus: 'pretty bad.' FieldMouse007: 'Ok card... take it when I have weak hand.' Ti-prod бесполезен без Space карт и уязвим к AMC. TFM stats: 32.5% winrate, -0.04 elo — подтверждают слабость.
Galilean Mining.when_to_pick: С Saturn Systems или при наличии нескольких Space карт + Jovian мультипликаторов. В большинстве случаев Business Empire и другие production прелюдии значительно лучше.

Biofuels.name: Biofuels
Biofuels.economy: 1 energy-prod = 7.5 MC, 1 plant-prod = 8 MC, 2 plants = ~3 MC. Microbe tag ~1 MC. Total ~19.5 MC.
Biofuels.reasoning: Well below average value (~19.5 MC vs 24.5 average). Weak production spread, bad tag. COTD consensus: 'pretty bad'. Only marginally useful if you desperately need energy for something and have Ecoline for plant conversion. Bottom 20% of preludes. [CORRECTED: 40/D -> 45/D. Desktop B but 24.9% WR bad]
Biofuels.when_to_pick: Almost never. Only if you desperately need energy prod and nothing better is available.

Biosphere Support.name: Biosphere Support
Biosphere Support.economy: 2 plant-prod (18.2 MC) - 1 MC-prod (-5.7 MC) = 12.5 MC net. Это ВДВОЕ меньше средней прелюдии (24.5 MC). Plant тег добавляет ~2 MC = 14.5 MC. Катастрофически плохо.
Biosphere Support.reasoning: Одна из худших прелюдий в игре. -1 MC-prod в gen 1 разрушителен (потеря ~5.7 MC). 2 plant-prod без MC для конвертации растений = медленно и неэффективно. shai_aus: 'It sucks. It suuuuuuuUUUUUUUuuuuuucks.' (27 upvotes). icehawk84: 'at least better than Society Support.' Даже с Ecoline + NRA — 'not that great' (icehawk84). Dome Farming строго лучше. TFM stats: 28.4% winrate, -0.97 elo — одна из самых низких в игре.
Biosphere Support.when_to_pick: Почти никогда. Даже с Ecoline + NRA в руке это слабый выбор. Dome Farming даёт тот же тег, лучший production, без MC penalty. Берите только если все альтернативы ещё хуже.

Nitrogen Shipment.name: Nitrogen Shipment
Nitrogen Shipment.economy: 1 TR (7.1 MC) + 1 plant-prod (9.1 MC) + 5 MC = 21.2 MC. Без тегов: -4 MC penalty = ~17.2 MC effective. Это значительно ниже средней (24.5 MC). Каждый компонент слишком мал чтобы что-то значить.
Nitrogen Shipment.reasoning: Одна из худших прелюдий в игре по мнению COTD экспертов. benbever подробно объясняет: '~24.5 MC value (exact average), but not actually good.' Проблема в том, что 'a little bit of everything, but not enough of anything.' 5 MC мало для взрывного gen 1, 1 plant-prod одна ничего не даёт, 1 TR gen 1 ≈ 1 MC-prod. shai_aus: 'contest for worst prelude.' Нет тегов — критический минус (-3 to -5 penalty). TFM stats: 29.3% winrate, -0.16 elo — подтверждают.
Nitrogen Shipment.when_to_pick: Почти никогда. benbever перечисляет редчайшие случаи (Ecoline, Sagitta, Terraformer milestone gen 1), но в обычной игре это худший выбор.

Society Support.name: Society Support
Society Support.economy: 1 plant-prod = 8 MC, 1 energy-prod = 7.5 MC, 1 heat-prod = 4 MC, -1 MC-prod = -5 MC. No tags = -3 MC. Total ~11.5 MC.
Society Support.reasoning: The worst or second-worst prelude in the game. Losing MC-prod in gen 1 is devastating, and you get 3 marginal productions in return with no tags at all. COTD (shai_aus): 'no idea what they were thinking'. The total value (~11.5 MC) is less than half the average prelude. Even the no-tag penalty is insult to injury. [CORRECTED: 30/F -> 28/F. Desktop D, 14.9% WR worst prelude confirms F]
Society Support.when_to_pick: Never. There is virtually no scenario where this is the right pick.

Space Port Colony.name: Space Port Colony
Space Port Colony.economy: 30 MC total (27+3) for colony + double colony + trade fleet + VP/2 colonies (~3-5 VP in 3P). Ti payable. Req: 1 colony. Combined value easily 60-90 MC.
Space Port Colony.reasoning: Arguably the strongest card in the entire game per Krazyguy75 ('top 3 card'). Double colony + trade fleet is game-breaking value. VP/2 colonies provides 3-5 VP in 3P for free. benbever writes extensive analysis confirming absurd value. Every COTD commenter rates it S-tier or higher. 'All double colony cards are broken.'
Space Port Colony.when_to_pick: Always draft, always play. One of the 3 best cards in the game with colonies.

Research Colony.name: Research Colony
Research Colony.economy: 20+3 MC = 23 MC (ti-payable). Colony placement (~14 MC SP) + double colony bonus (extra trade income ~5-10 MC/gen) + 2 cards (7 MC) + Science тег (3 MC) = 29-34+ MC value. С двойной колонией на Luna = ~6 MC extra/trade = 30+ MC за несколько gens.
Research Colony.reasoning: Одна из сильнейших карт в игре. Уникальная способность размещать колонию ТАМ ЖЕ, где уже есть колония — game-breaking. benbever: 'Very strong. Probably the best place-a-colony card... borderline unbalanced if you play this gen 1 for 2 colonies on Luna/Ceres/Pluto.' Krazyguy75: 'Top 10 card. Insanely unbalanced. I would play this for 30 easily.' 2 cards + Science тег + ti-payable. Нет requirements. TFM stats: 59.2% winrate, +1.36 elo — подтверждают доминирование.
Research Colony.when_to_pick: Всегда берём. Instadraft, instabuy. Единственная причина не играть — нет MC на gen 1 И колонии слабые. С Poseidon — абсолютно разрушительно.

Sky Docks.name: Sky Docks
Sky Docks.economy: 21 MC total (18+3) for extra trade fleet (~10+ MC/gen) + -1 MC/card discount (~2-3 MC/gen) + 2 VP (~10 MC) + Space+Earth tags (~4 MC). Ti payable. Req: 2 Earth tags.
Sky Docks.reasoning: One of the best cards in the game. benbever writes extensive analysis showing it outvalues Earth Catapult. Extra trade fleet is game-breaking with good colonies. -1 MC discount on ALL cards compounds heavily. 2 VP provides floor value. Community calls it 'S+' and 'Earth Cat of Colonies.' 2 Earth tag requirement is mild with preludes.
Sky Docks.when_to_pick: Always draft. Play ASAP when 2 Earth tags met. Top 5 card in colony games.

Nitrogen-Rich Asteroid.name: Nitrogen-Rich Asteroid
Nitrogen-Rich Asteroid.economy: С 3 plant тегами: 34 MC total (ti-payable) за 4 plant-prod (36.4 MC) + 3 TR (21.3 MC income + VP) + temp bonus = 57+ MC value. Без тегов: 1 plant-prod (9.1 MC) + 3 TR (21.3 MC) = 30.4 MC за 34 MC = break-even, но Space тег (ti-payable) снижает cost.
Nitrogen-Rich Asteroid.reasoning: Одна из самых мощных карт при 3+ plant тегах. shai_aus саркастически: 'Absolutely terrible' (42 upvotes) — маскирует S-tier оценку. С 3 plant тегами: 4 plant-prod + 3 TR + temp raise. ad_hocNC: 'worth speculating on plant tags.' benbever: 'game-defining card, you'll value plant tags more because NRA exists.' Без 3 plant тегов: 1 plant-prod + 3 TR = всё ещё хорошо (31 MC total, ti-payable). TFM stats: 57.2% winrate, +0.91 elo.
Nitrogen-Rich Asteroid.when_to_pick: С 3+ plant тегами — must-pick, одна из лучших карт в игре. Без plant тегов — всё ещё хороший ti-dump за 3 TR. Спекулятивно берём ранних plant тегов ради этой карты.

Research Outpost.name: Research Outpost
Research Outpost.economy: 18+3 MC (steel payable) за city (14 MC) + -1 MC/card (~2-3 MC-prod = 11.4-17.1 MC) + Science тег (3 MC) + Building тег (1 MC) + City тег (1 MC) = 30-36 MC gen 1 value. Эффективность ~1.5-1.7x.
Research Outpost.reasoning: Лучший city в игре по консенсусу COTD. shai_aus: 'probably the best city' (28 upvotes). benbever детально считает: '32+ MC value if played gen 1' — city (14 MC) + building тег (1 MC) + science тег (3 MC) + -1 MC/card discount (~2-3 MC-prod equivalent) = 30+ MC за 18 MC (steel payable). Не требует energy. Тройной тег (Science+City+Building) невероятно ценен. TFM stats: 59.1% winrate, +1.33 elo — топ-карта.
Research Outpost.when_to_pick: Почти всегда, особенно gen 1-2. Поздняя игра — сложнее разместить (нет свободных мест 'рядом ни с чем'). Приоритет: play early, steel dump, grab placement bonus.

Earth Catapult.name: Earth Catapult
Earth Catapult.economy: 23 MC + 3 MC card = 26 MC cost. Effect: -2 MC per card played. With 13+ cards played: 26+ MC saved = break even + 2 VP. Typically 8-12 cards after playing this = 16-24 MC saved + 2 VP (~10 MC).
Earth Catapult.reasoning: Strong contender for best project card in the game. Per icehawk84, if gotten early-to-mid game, you stop whatever you're doing to play it. The 2 MC discount on every card compounds massively with card draw engines. The 2 VP and Earth tag add significant value. Per benbever, great with Credicor, Vitor, and Earth Office. Only weakness: expensive to deploy and needs card flow to maximize.
Earth Catapult.when_to_pick: Almost always in gen 1-4. Even gen 5 can be worth it with strong card draw. Top 3 draft priority.

Mars University.name: Mars University
Mars University.economy: Cost 8+3=11 MC (steel payable). Value: 1 VP (5) + Science tag (3-5) + Building tag (1-2) + card cycling (~2 MC per science tag played). After 3-4 science tags = 6-8 MC from cycling.
Mars University.reasoning: One of the best cards in the game. Cheap, no requirements, incredible tags (Science+Building), 1 VP, and the card cycling effect is a true engine enabler. COTD experts nearly unanimously rate it top 5. The ability to swap bad cards for new ones compounds over the game. Even ad_hocNC, who is skeptical of engines, acknowledges its potency.
Mars University.when_to_pick: Always. First-pick caliber in most drafts. Play as early as possible to maximize cycling value.

Solar Logistics.name: Solar Logistics
Solar Logistics.economy: 20+3 MC = 23 MC - 6 MC (2 ti) = 17 MC effective. 1 VP (1.6+ MC). -2 MC Earth discount (~4-6 MC over game). Card draw on ANY space event: ~3-5 cards = 10.5-17.5 MC. Total value: 33-42+ MC. Эффективность 1.5-2x+.
Solar Logistics.reasoning: Карта с избыточным дизайном, которую COTD единодушно считает overpowered. Рисует карту когда ЛЮБОЙ игрок играет Space event — в 3P это 3-5+ карт за игру. Плюс -2 MC discount на Earth теги. Плюс 2 titanium. Плюс 1 VP. FieldMouse007 саркастически: 'Terrible card design' (= сломана). CaptainCFloyd: 'really busted.' Одна playgroup убрала VP и titanium — 'still a priority card.' icehawk84: 'Powerful... could discourage opponents from space events.' При 20 MC cost — это S-tier.
Solar Logistics.when_to_pick: Берём почти всегда кроме последних 1-2 gen. Чем раньше — тем больше карт нарисуем. С Earth discounts — абсолютно доминирует.

Kelp Farming.name: Kelp Farming
Kelp Farming.economy: 17+3 MC = 20 MC за 3 plant-prod (27.3 MC) + 2 MC-prod (11.4 MC) + 2 plants (~2.3 MC) + 1 VP (1.6 MC) + Plant тег (2 MC) = 44.6 MC value. Эффективность 2.2x. Одна из самых эффективных карт в игре.
Kelp Farming.reasoning: Одна из лучших карт в игре, определяющая стратегию океанов. benbever: 'One of the best cards in the game, and the best plant production card. Insane value for money.' 3 plant-prod + 2 MC-prod + 2 plants + 1 VP + Plant тег за 20 MC — невероятная эффективность. 6 ocean req = gen 2-4 в 3P с прелюдиями. icehawk84: 'game-defining, clearly better than Trees.' Лучшая цель для Ecology Experts. TFM stats: 56.7% winrate, +0.95 elo.
Kelp Farming.when_to_pick: Берём всегда при возможности. Если 6 океанов далеко, держим в руке и торопим океаны. Определяет стратегию — если есть Kelp Farming, идём в океаны. Если оппонент идёт в океаны — у него может быть эта карта.

Insects.name: Insects
Insects.economy: 9+3 MC = 12 MC за 3-4 plant-prod (27-36 MC) typically = 2.3-3x efficiency. С 2 plant тегами = 18.2 MC = 1.5x (уже хорошо). С 5+ тегами = 45+ MC = game-winning. Microbe тег добавляет ~2 MC.
Insects.reasoning: Одна из лучших карт в base game, определяющая ценность plant тегов. shai_aus: 'one of the best cards in the game' (21 upvotes). ad_hocNC: 'Top 5 card in base and preludes.' benbever: '15-24 plants in 8 gen game. That's 2-3 greeneries for only 12 MC.' С 3-4 plant тегами gen 3-4 = devastating. Microbe тег — бонус. 6% O2 requirement легко достижим к mid-game. В all expansions чуть слабее из-за dilution plant тегов, но всё ещё отличная. TFM stats: 55.1% winrate, +0.75 elo.
Insects.when_to_pick: С 2+ plant тегами — must-pick. Даже с 1 plant тегом стоит спекулировать. Hate-draft от plant player обязателен. С all expansions ceiling чуть ниже, но floor всё ещё высокий.

Spin-off Department.name: Spin-off Department
Spin-off Department.economy: 13 MC total (10+3) for 2 MC-prod (~10 MC) + card draw on every 20+ MC card played. Building tag, steel payable. Effectively 3-4 MC for the draw effect alone.
Spin-off Department.reasoning: icehawk84 says 'on par with Mars University.' Subtracting Sponsors' cost (9 MC for 2 MC-prod), the card draw effect costs only ~4 MC. With ~62 cards costing 20+ MC in the full deck, engine players trigger this 3-5 times per game. COTD unanimously rates it very highly. Building tag + steel payable makes it easy to play. One of the best engine cards in Colonies.
Spin-off Department.when_to_pick: Always draft early. Play gen 1-2 for maximum draw value. Never pass in draft.

Olympus Conference.name: Olympus Conference
Olympus Conference.economy: 10+3 MC = 13 MC (steel payable ~8-9 MC effective). ~2-4 карты за игру = 7-14 MC card draw + 1 VP (1.6 MC) + triple тег (Science 3 + Earth 2 + Building 1 = 6 MC) = 21.6-28.6 MC. Эффективность 2-3x.
Olympus Conference.reasoning: Превосходная engine карта. shai_aus: 'amazing card, nothing not to like' (30 upvotes). Тройной тег Science+Earth+Building = невероятная ценность. Steel payable. Card draw на каждый Science тег (включая себя). 1 VP. Нет requirements. Чуть слабее Mars University (swap vs draw с задержкой), но Earth тег компенсирует. TFM stats: 56.8% winrate, +0.92 elo. Одна из лучших engine карт в игре.
Olympus Conference.when_to_pick: Берём почти всегда. No requirements + steel payable = gen 1 play. Сильнее с Science engine, но даже без него — тройной тег + VP за 13 MC (steel) = отлично.

Giant Ice Asteroid.name: Giant Ice Asteroid
Giant Ice Asteroid.economy: 36 MC (ti payable) + 3 MC card = 39 MC cost. Returns: 2 TR temp (~14.4 MC) + 2 oceans (2 TR ~14.4 MC + 2 placement bonuses ~6 MC) + plant attack. Total ~35+ MC in TR + bonuses. Space+Event tags.
Giant Ice Asteroid.reasoning: One of the best space events — massively efficient terraforming in a single action. 4 TR for 39 MC = 9.75 MC per TR, which is good value. The 2 oceans provide placement bonuses and trigger ocean requirements. Ti payable with Phobolog makes this absurdly efficient. The plant attack is a bonus (take-that penalty applies in 3P but it's not the core value). Per community, this is a top-tier event card.
Giant Ice Asteroid.when_to_pick: Almost always when seen. Especially powerful when ocean placement bonuses and temperature bonuses are available.

L1 Trade Terminal.name: L1 Trade Terminal
L1 Trade Terminal.economy: 25 MC + 3 MC card = 28 MC. Space tag, 2 VP. Effect: +2 colony track steps per trade = +6-8 MC value per trade. Over 5+ trades = 30-40 MC+ value. Also adds resources to 3 different cards.
L1 Trade Terminal.reasoning: Extremely powerful colony synergy card that generates massive recurring value. Each trade gives +2 track steps worth 6-8 MC, and with a second trade fleet this doubles. Even over 3-4 trades the card pays for itself. The 2 VP and resource placement are gravy. Space tag for titanium payment. One of the strongest Prelude 2 additions.
L1 Trade Terminal.when_to_pick: Always keep in opening hand. Top draft priority in Colony games. The earlier you play this, the more value it generates.

Protected Habitats.name: Protected Habitats
Protected Habitats.economy: 5+3 MC = 8 MC за protection. В base game ~1.5-2 plant-prod equivalent = 13.7-18.2 MC. С all expansions ~0.5-1 plant-prod = 4.6-9.1 MC. No tag penalty -4 MC. Ceiling высокий с plant engine, floor низкий без него.
Protected Habitats.reasoning: Мощная защитная карта. shai_aus: 'One of the few S-tier cards in the base game' (22 upvotes). В 3P — перенаправляет ВСЕ атаки на оппонентов, двойной бонус. Krazyguy75 правильно отмечает: с all expansions 'attack density drops to ~0.2 plant-prod equivalent,' что снижает ценность. ad_hocNC: 'solid A Tier but often more pressing cards.' Нет тегов — штраф. TFM stats: 54.3% winrate, +0.55 elo — хорошо, но не топ. Оценка снижена с 84 до 80: в формате all expansions атак меньше.
Protected Habitats.when_to_pick: С plant-heavy стратегией — приоритет. Для hate-draft — тоже хорошо. Но в all expansions не спешите играть рано — подождите, пока будет что защищать. Не автопик без plant engine.

Cutting Edge Technology.name: Cutting Edge Technology
Cutting Edge Technology.economy: -2 MC за requirement карты + 1 VP. Топ engine карта.
Cutting Edge Technology.reasoning: Универсальный дискаунт на req карты. 1 VP бонусом. Science тег ценный.
Cutting Edge Technology.when_to_pick: Всегда хорош если есть 2+ req карт в руке.

Ecological Zone.name: Ecological Zone
Ecological Zone.economy: 12 MC + 3 MC card = 15 MC cost. Returns: tile placement (~4-6 MC), starts with 1 animal (counts own 2 tags), Plant+Animal tags (~3 MC). Typically accumulates 3-4 VP = 15-20 MC. With bio combos: 5+ VP.
Ecological Zone.reasoning: One of the best combo cards in the game. Per shai_aus, it's a vital part of the 'holy Plant Trinity' with Viral Enhancers and Decomposers. Per ad_hocNC, it's the best point card in base game. The dual Plant+Animal tags are incredible for milestones (Ecologist, NRA) and trigger both bio-tag accumulator chains. The tile placement adds additional value. Easily 3-4 VP even without heavy combos. [CORRECTED: 83/A -> 88/A. Desktop S, +0.80 elo, self-triggering animal engine]
Ecological Zone.when_to_pick: High priority whenever you have or plan for a greenery. Core card for bio-tag strategies. Hate-draft from plant players.

AI Central.name: AI Central
AI Central.economy: 21+3=24 MC + ~7 MC energy-prod = 31 MC effective. Action: draw 2 cards/gen = 6-8 MC value/gen. 1 VP = 5 MC. Payoff in ~4 gens. Science+Building tags worth ~4 MC.
AI Central.reasoning: One of the strongest card-draw engines in the game. 2 free cards per gen is enormous value for engine players. However, as COTD commenters note, it is somewhat overrated -- it needs 3 Science tags, energy production, and a strong economy to play the drawn cards. Played gen 3-4 with good economy it is top-tier; gen 6+ it is mediocre. The high setup cost means it is not always playable.
AI Central.when_to_pick: When you already have 2+ Science tags and energy production, and expect a longer game. Counter-draft to deny engine players.

Deimos Down.name: Deimos Down
Deimos Down.economy: 31 MC (ti payable) + 3 MC card = 34 MC cost. Returns: 3 TR (~21.6 MC) + 4 steel (~8 MC) + plant attack (~8 MC value in 3P, less due to take-that). Effective cost vs 3 SP asteroids: 34 vs 42 MC.
Deimos Down.reasoning: One of the best space events in the game. 3 temperature raises for 34 MC is significantly cheaper than standard projects. The 4 steel returned partially offsets the cost. Plant removal is a bonus (take-that penalty mitigated because the core value is in terraforming, not the attack). Ti payable makes it even more efficient. Per shai_aus and ad_hocNC, it's a top 10 base game card. [CORRECTED: 82/A -> 84/A. +1.03 elo, Desktop A confirms strong]
Deimos Down.when_to_pick: Almost always when seen. Best early for heat production bonuses, but good at any point for efficient temperature rushing.

Earth Office.name: Earth Office
Earth Office.economy: 1 MC + 3 MC card = 4 MC cost. Effect: -3 MC per Earth tag played. Pays for itself in 2 Earth tags. With 4-6 Earth tags: 12-18 MC saved = huge profit.
Earth Office.reasoning: Underpriced card that easily pays for itself. Per icehawk84, it's ridiculously strong for Point Luna and Teractor. Per FieldMouse007, it pays for itself in 2 Earth tags and everything after is pure profit. The Earth tag itself counts toward other Earth synergies. At 4 MC total cost, the risk of picking it up is minimal even if you only play 2-3 more Earth tags. [CORRECTED: 82/A -> 90/S. Desktop S, +1.43 elo top-5, -3 MC on all Earth cards game-changing]
Earth Office.when_to_pick: Almost always pick early. Even as speculation on future Earth tags, the cost is trivially low.

Large Convoy.name: Large Convoy
Large Convoy.economy: 36 MC + 3 MC card = 39 MC. 2 VP + ocean (TR + bonus ~9 MC) + 2 cards (~6 MC) + 5 plants or 4 animals on 1VP animal (2-4 VP = 10-20 MC). Full value with 1VP animal: ~45-55 MC value. Ti-payable, heavy discounts.
Large Convoy.reasoning: Premier late-game point bomb, especially with a 1VP animal card. The Earth+Space event tags enable massive discounts making the high cost manageable. With a 1VP animal, the 4 animals = 4 VP making the total output 7+ VP plus cards and ocean. Even the plant mode is reasonable mid-game with oxygen not maxed. High draft priority card that shapes strategy.
Large Convoy.when_to_pick: Keep from opening hand if you expect to find 1VP animal. High draft priority. Excellent last-gen titanium dump.

Psychrophiles.name: Psychrophiles
Psychrophiles.economy: 2+3 MC = 5 MC за ~2 MC-prod for plant cards (~11.4 MC) + Microbe тег (2 MC) + stall action value = 13.4+ MC. Эффективность ~2.7x. С microbe colony = ещё ценнее.
Psychrophiles.reasoning: Одна из самых импактных дешёвых карт в игре. icehawk84: 'Among cards costing less than 5 MC, probably the most impactful.' shai_aus: 'great little card' (25 upvotes). benbever: '2 income for plant cards, which is usually not a problem.' Microbe тег полезен для Ecologist/Decomposers. Max -20C req гарантирует раннюю игру. Stall action бонусом. FieldMouse007: 'perfect little investment early game.' TFM stats: 53.3% winrate, +0.55 elo — solid.
Psychrophiles.when_to_pick: Берём почти всегда в early game (temp ≤ -20C). Окно закрывается быстро — в 3P с WGT температура растёт быстро. Если temp уже > -20C — бесполезна.

Viral Enhancers.name: Viral Enhancers
Viral Enhancers.economy: 9+3=12 MC for effect: +1 plant or +1 resource per bio tag played. Science+Microbe tags (~5-7 MC). With 5 bio tags after: ~5 plants (10 MC) + 2-3 animal VP (10-15 MC). Science tag bonus.
Viral Enhancers.reasoning: icehawk84 says 'S tier card.' shai_aus says 'one of the best combo cards.' benbever details how just 3 bio tags + 1 animal card already pays it back. The Science+Microbe dual tag is excellent. Every plant/animal/microbe tag gives value. Even moderate bio play yields great returns. Only skip if completely non-bio strategy.
Viral Enhancers.when_to_pick: Almost always. Draft priority. Science tag alone justifies early play. Effect compounds beautifully with bio engine.

Anti-Gravity Technology.name: Anti-Gravity Technology
Anti-Gravity Technology.economy: 14+3 MC = 17 MC за 3 VP (4.8+ MC) + -2 MC/card discount (~6-12 MC over remaining gens). Total: 11-17+ MC от эффектов. Break-even нужно 3-4 карты после play. С engine = game-winning.
Anti-Gravity Technology.reasoning: Награда за Science engine. 3 VP + -2 MC/card discount при 7 Science тегах. shai_aus: 'godly card for engines' (29 upvotes), но 'hard to get turned on early.' Основная проблема — 7 Science тегов + AGT в руке одновременно = редкость. shai_aus: 'aspirational card.' ad_hocNC скептичен к Jovian payoffs. Когда работает — S-tier. Когда нет — holding cost. TFM stats: 57.7% winrate, +1.03 elo — высокий, потому что играется только когда условие выполнено.
Anti-Gravity Technology.when_to_pick: При 5+ Science тегах — must-pick. При 3-4 — спекулятивно берём. Hate-draft от Science player. Не берём если нет Science engine.

Conscription.name: Conscription
Conscription.economy: 5+3=8 MC cost. -16 MC discount on next card. Net: +8 MC gain - 1 VP (5 MC late-game). Net +3-8 MC depending on timing. Earth tag (2-3 MC) adds value.
Conscription.reasoning: Like Indentured Workers on steroids. Net 8 MC for -1 VP is excellent early-mid game (8 MC >> 1 VP in gens 1-5). The Earth tag adds synergy with Point Luna, Earth Office, Teractor. The 2 Earth tag requirement is achievable with preludes and corporations. Even late game, enabling a 16+ MC card for cheap has significant value. The -1 VP is negligible when the discount enables a powerful play. One of the best discount events. [CORRECTED: 80/A -> 72/B. +0.36 elo low, Desktop A but stats say B]
Conscription.when_to_pick: When you have 2 Earth tags and a 16+ MC card to play. Almost always worth it gens 1-6.

Deimos Down:promo.name: Deimos Down:promo
Deimos Down:promo.economy: 31 MC (ti payable) + 3 MC card = 34 MC cost. Returns: 3 TR (~21.6 MC) + 4 steel (~8 MC) + tile placement bonus + plant attack (6 instead of 8). Similar economics to original with tile bonus.
Deimos Down:promo.reasoning: Promo revision of Deimos Down — slightly different (tile placement added, plant removal reduced to 6). The tile placement is a net positive, making this arguably equal to or slightly better than the original depending on available spots. Same core strengths: efficient 3-temperature raise with ti payability.
Deimos Down:promo.when_to_pick: Same as original Deimos Down — almost always draft when seen.

Imported Nitrogen.name: Imported Nitrogen
Imported Nitrogen.economy: 23 MC + 3 MC card = 26 MC. 1 TR (~7 MC) + 4 plants (~8 MC half greenery) + 3 microbes (1-2 VP = 5-10 MC) + 2 animals (2 VP = 10 MC on 1VP animal). Max: ~35 MC value. Ti-payable, heavy discounts possible.
Imported Nitrogen.reasoning: One of the best late-game point bombs when you have a 1VP animal card. Earth+Space event tags enable the most discounts in the game. With a 1VP animal, it's potentially 5-6 points for a heavily discounted cost. Even mid-game with oxygen not maxed, the plants can become a greenery for 2 TR total. Requires setup but ceiling is very high.
Imported Nitrogen.when_to_pick: High draft priority. Keep from opening hand if you expect to find animal/microbe targets. Best with 1VP animal card.

Nuclear Zone.name: Nuclear Zone
Nuclear Zone.economy: 10+3 MC = 13 MC за 2 TR (14.2 MC income) - 2 VP (-3.2 MC late) + placement bonus (2-6 MC) + Earth тег (2 MC) + tile для awards = 15-19 MC. Efficiency хорошая, но -2 VP болезненны last gen.
Nuclear Zone.reasoning: Очень эффективный temperature raise. shai_aus: 'great card, one of the best... have nuked before, would nuke again' (34 upvotes). icehawk84: 'often very good... used to block opponents, pick up resources, end the game.' ad_hocNC: 'favourite card, by far the cheapest way to raise temperature.' benbever считает: gen 1 value ~15 MC для дохода + placement bonus + Earth тег. -2 VP offset by 2 TR income. Но в 3P/WGT/all exp — сокращение игры на 1 gen для engine players = минус. Снижен с 80 до 79 — сильный B-tier, но не A для engine strats.
Nuclear Zone.when_to_pick: Отлично для terraforming/rush стратегий. Хорош для game control — surprise end game. Для engine players — осторожно, сокращает игру. Hate-draft высокий в 3P.

Optimal Aerobraking.name: Optimal Aerobraking
Optimal Aerobraking.economy: Cost 7+3=10 MC. Value: Space tag (1-2) + 3 MC + 3 heat (~3.6 MC) per space event = ~6.6 MC per trigger. Breaks even at 2 space events. After 4 events = +16 MC.
Optimal Aerobraking.reasoning: Excellent rebate card. Space events are among the strongest cards in the game, and this adds pure value to already-good plays. shai_aus (24 upvotes) and benbever both rate it highly. Breaks even after just 2 space events. The heat helps with temperature racing. Works for both engine and rush strategies. [CORRECTED: 80/A -> 82/A. +0.83 elo, Desktop A confirms]
Optimal Aerobraking.when_to_pick: Early game with space events in hand or planned. Even mid-game it's good if you expect 2+ more space events.

Research.name: Research
Research.economy: 11+3 MC = 14 MC за 2 cards (7 MC) + 2 Science тега (6 MC) + 1 VP (1.6 MC) = 14.6 MC base. С Mars University: +2 card draws = +7 MC. С Olympus Conference: +1 draw = +3.5 MC. Итого с engine: 25+ MC.
Research.reasoning: Премиальная Science engine карта. Двойной Science тег невероятно ценен для AI Central, AGT, Scientist milestone/award. 2 cards net-нейтральны по MC (11+3 = 14 MC, 2 cards = 7 MC + 2 Science = 6 MC + 1 VP = 1.6 MC = 14.6 MC). Но реальная ценность — в синергиях: Mars University draws 2, Olympus Conference draws 1, Science milestone progress +2. Community consensus: 'insta-pick' if going Science. TFM stats: 56.4% winrate, +0.85 elo.
Research.when_to_pick: С Science engine — must-pick. Без Science engine — всё ещё decent за 2 cards + VP + теги, но не приоритет. Hate-draft от Science player.

Space Port.name: Space Port
Space Port.economy: 22+3 MC = 25 MC (steel payable) за city (~14 MC) + 4 MC-prod (22.8 MC) - 1 energy-prod (-9.7 MC) + trade fleet (~15-25 MC over game) = 43-53 MC. Efficiency 1.7-2.1x. -1 energy = нужен energy source для double trade.
Space Port.reasoning: Extra Trade Fleet — одна из самых ценных способностей в Colonies. 'Worst of the double trade fleet cards' по мнению COTD, но 'that's still very good' (Futuralis). Krazyguy75: 'expensive to fully utilize but game winning once active.' City + 4 MC-prod + trade fleet за 22 MC (steel payable). -1 energy болезненно для double trading. TFM stats: 59.9% winrate, +1.66 elo — ОДИН ИЗ САМЫХ ВЫСОКИХ В ИГРЕ. Требует 1 colony — лёгкое условие.
Space Port.when_to_pick: С colony strategy — must-pick. С 1+ colony и energy production — отлично. Steel payable снижает effective cost. Hate-draft если оппонент уже в colonies. Не берём без colonies.

Terraforming Ganymede.name: Terraforming Ganymede
Terraforming Ganymede.economy: 33+3 MC = 36 MC (ti-payable). С 3 Jovian: 3 TR = 21.3 MC income. С 4 Jovian: 4 TR = 28.4 MC. С 5+: 35.5+ MC. Break-even at 5 tags (without ti). С ti = break-even at 3-4 tags. Jovian тег + Space тег (5 MC) добавляют.
Terraforming Ganymede.reasoning: Capstone для Jovian стратегии. shai_aus: 'wouldn't always play it, but at least pick it to deny Jovian player.' С 4+ Jovian тегами — мощная finisher. Но 33 MC (ti-payable) = дорого, и Jovian стратегия сама по себе 'risky and expensive' (shai_aus). icehawk84: 'automatic hate-draft.' В 3P hate-draft стоимость высока. С 3 тегами: 3 TR = 21.3 MC за 36 MC (ti-payable ~24 MC) = decent. С 5+ тегами: 5 TR = 35.5 MC = excellent. TFM stats: 55.5% winrate, +0.78 elo.
Terraforming Ganymede.when_to_pick: С 3+ Jovian тегами и titanium — хорошая finisher. Hate-draft от Jovian player = высокий приоритет. Без Jovian стратегии — too expensive.

Imported Hydrogen.name: Imported Hydrogen
Imported Hydrogen.economy: 16+3 MC = 19 MC (ti-payable). Ocean (14 MC) + 3 plants (~6 MC) OR 2 animals (~3-6 MC VP) + Earth тег (2 MC) + Space тег (1 MC) = 23-24 MC base. С discounts (OA +6, Earth Office +3, Solar Logistics +5.5): 34.5-37.5 MC.
Imported Hydrogen.reasoning: Солидный space event с тройным тегом (Earth+Space+Event). shai_aus: 'solid, mid- to upper-tier space event' (14 upvotes). benbever детально: 'even without discounts, 19 MC for ocean + 3 plants/microbes/animals = good deal.' Great_GW: 'Very nice card. Discountable.' Гибкость выбора (plants OR microbes OR animals) + ocean + ti-payable + Earth тег для discounts. С Optimal Aerobraking + Solar Logistics = massively discounted. TFM stats: 54.9% winrate, +0.78 elo.
Imported Hydrogen.when_to_pick: Почти всегда worth drafting. С Earth/Space discounts — отлично. Ocean + flexible resources + ti dump. Последний gen — хороший ti dump для 2 animal VP.

Arctic Algae.name: Arctic Algae
Arctic Algae.economy: 12+3=15 MC for Plant tag (1-2 MC) + 1 plant (2 MC) + effect: 2 plants per ocean placed. If 5+ oceans after play: 10+ plants = 1+ greenery (8+ MC value).
Arctic Algae.reasoning: Extremely strong when played before many oceans. 2 plants per ocean placed by anyone gives huge value -- if 5 oceans come after you play this, that is 10 plants (more than a greenery). The plants come all at once when oceans drop, making them harder to attack. Max -12C requirement can be tricky -- sometimes temperature races past it before you play. In 3P with preludes, a great gen 1 card. [CORRECTED: 79/B -> 83/A. +0.80 elo, Desktop A]
Arctic Algae.when_to_pick: Gen 1 starting hand if -12C is met. High priority -- the earlier you play it, the more oceans you catch.

Advanced Ecosystems.name: Advanced Ecosystems
Advanced Ecosystems.economy: 11+3=14 MC for 3 VP (15 MC). Triple tag (Plant+Microbe+Animal) worth 3-6 MC in synergies. With Decomposers+Eco Zone: +2 VP. With Viral Enhancers: +3 plants.
Advanced Ecosystems.reasoning: 3 VP for 14 MC is one of the best VP-per-MC ratios in the game. The triple bio-tag triggers massive combos with Decomposers, Ecological Zone, Viral Enhancers, GMO Contract, and Splice. The requirement (1 of each bio tag) is achievable in all-expansion games. High counter-draft priority. Slightly below A-tier because the requirement can sometimes be hard to meet.
Advanced Ecosystems.when_to_pick: When you have or expect to have Plant+Microbe+Animal tags. Counter-draft even if you cannot play it to deny opponents 3+ VP.

Dusk Laser Mining.name: Dusk Laser Mining
Dusk Laser Mining.economy: 8 MC (ti payable) + 3 MC card + ~7 MC energy prod = ~18 MC cost. Returns: 4 ti (~12 MC immediate) + 1 ti-prod (~12.5 MC gen1) + Space tag (~2 MC). Effectively ~4-6 MC for ti-prod after ti rebate.
Dusk Laser Mining.reasoning: Disgusting value if you have energy production to spare. The 4 titanium returned nearly pays for the entire card, making the ti-prod almost free. Per shai_aus, 'disgustingly good value.' Per benbever, with Phobolog or Advanced Alloys, you pay 2 ti + 3 MC and get 4 ti (worth 16) back immediately. The 2 Science tag requirement is manageable for engine players who already have science tags.
Dusk Laser Mining.when_to_pick: Gen 1-3 with 2 science tags and spare energy production. Still good mid-game due to instant ti rebate.

Indentured Workers.name: Indentured Workers
Indentured Workers.economy: 0+3 MC = 3 MC за 8 MC discount - 1 VP (1.6 MC late) = 5 MC net profit at draft cost. Или 7 MC profit если получена бесплатно (минус 1 MC opportunity cost). Нет тегов = -4 MC penalty. Effective: 1-3 MC net.
Indentured Workers.reasoning: Отличная темпо-карта. benbever: 'For 0-3 MC you get 8 MC discount minus 1 VP. Very good.' shai_aus: 'a 5 MC discount is pretty great in the early game' (17 upvotes). ad_hocNC: 'If what you're spending that 5MC on is not worth more than 1pt then it's not something you should be spending.' Лучший юз-кейс — Earth Catapult gen 1 (discount бесполезен для карты, которая уже даёт -2 MC). С IC + Media Group = бонусный income. Нет тегов — минус (-4 MC penalty). TFM stats: 52.7% winrate, +0.64 elo — solid.
Indentured Workers.when_to_pick: С дорогой engine картой в руке gen 1 — отлично. Earth Catapult + IW = ideal combo. Поздняя игра — слабее (меньше gen для отыгрыша -1 VP). Без targets — можно продать.

Mangrove.name: Mangrove
Mangrove.economy: 12+3 MC = 15 MC за greenery (23 MC SP) + 1 VP (1.6 MC) + Plant тег (2 MC) + O2 TR если не maxed (7.1 MC) = 26.7-33.7 MC. Efficiency 1.8-2.2x. Ocean spot placement bonuses (2-4 MC) добавляют.
Mangrove.reasoning: Одна из лучших VP-карт. shai_aus: 'superb if you can get full value' (14-15 upvotes). Krazyguy75: '10 MC in VP minimum, plus 5 more if you get O2.' ad_hocNC: 'one of the best VP cards, almost always worth taking... tile is very valuable for awards.' Greenery на ocean space + 1 VP + O2 raise (если не maxed) + placement bonuses + Plant тег. 4C req лёгкий. Уникальное размещение — можно 'телепортировать' greenery куда нужно. Повышен с 78 до 80.
Mangrove.when_to_pick: Почти всегда берём — one of the best last-gen plays. Даже mid-game хорош за O2 raise. Plant тег для NRA/Insects. ad_hocNC drafts it early despite late play window.

Space Hotels.name: Space Hotels
Space Hotels.economy: 15 MC total (12+3) for 4 MC-prod (~20-24 MC) + Space+Earth tags (~4 MC). Req: 2 Earth tags. Ti payable. 3.75 MC per MC-prod = excellent rate.
Space Hotels.reasoning: Best MC production card per MC/prod ratio. 3.75 MC per production is exceptional. Space+Earth tags add synergy value. Ti payable reduces effective cost. 2 Earth tag requirement is manageable with corps/preludes. benbever shows it is strictly better value than Acquired Company. Must be played gen 1-2 for full value.
Space Hotels.when_to_pick: Gen 1 with 2 Earth tags (or 1 + corp/prelude). Loses value rapidly after gen 2.

Trading Colony.name: Trading Colony
Trading Colony.economy: 18+3 MC = 21 MC (ti-payable). Colony (14 MC SP) + Trade Envoys effect (~3 MC-prod equivalent = 17.1 MC) + Space тег (1 MC) = 32+ MC. С double trade fleet = 34+ MC. Efficiency 1.5-1.6x.
Trading Colony.reasoning: Colony + Trade Envoys effect за 4 MC сверх SP colony. Krazyguy75: 'the standard project for colonies is already way too cheap, yet this is a major benefit for only 4 more.' benbever детально объясняет Trade Envoys synergy — +1 step per trade worth 1 ti/3 MC/2 steel/1 card. EspritFort: 'no-brainer.' Ti-payable Space тег. TFM stats: 57.6% winrate, +0.82 elo — очень высокий. Повышен с 78 до 80.
Trading Colony.when_to_pick: С colony strategy — высокий приоритет. Ti-payable = дешёвый entry. Trade Envoys effect best early — чем больше trades, тем больше value. Hate-draft от colony player.

Mining Colony.name: Mining Colony
Mining Colony.economy: 23+3=26 MC (ti payable). Colony SP=17, ti-prod=~12 MC gen1. Total value ~29 MC. Net gain ~3-6 MC + Space тег (~2 MC). Phobolog: 5 ti + 3 MC = огромный дисконт.
Mining Colony.reasoning: Colony + 1 ti-prod за 23 MC (ti payable) — отличная комбинация. По benbever: океан колонии стоит ~17 MC как SP, ti-prod стоит ~12 MC в gen 1, итого ~29 MC ценности за 23 MC. Space тег полезен для Spacefarer/Diversifier. CaptainCFloyd отмечает, что если ставишь колонию в gen 1 всё равно, то фактически получаешь ti-prod за ~6 MC. Однако ценность падает в mid-late game, и зависит от доступных колоний. Не дотягивает до A-тира из-за условности (нужна хорошая колония). TFM stats: +0.78 elo — солидно, но не выдающе.
Mining Colony.when_to_pick: Берём в gen 1-3 при хороших колониях (Luna, Pluto, Triton). Чем позже — тем хуже. Особенно сильна с Phobolog или при наличии титаниума.

Venus Orbital Survey.name: Venus Orbital Survey
Venus Orbital Survey.economy: 18+3=21 MC (ti payable). Action: ~3.5 MC/turn (1 card draw value). За 5 gen = ~17.5 MC value. С учётом occasional free Venus card = ~20+ MC. Break-even за 5-6 activations.
Venus Orbital Survey.reasoning: Action: reveal 2 карты, Venus карты бесплатно в руку, остальные можно купить за 3 MC. Insanitarius- называет её 'fantastic' — слабее AI Central (1 карта вместо 2), но дешевле, нет requirements, ti payable. Venus+Space двойной тег полезен. Без requirement — можно играть в gen 1-2, что критически важно для engine карт. Недостаток: карты открыты оппонентам, Venus карты не всегда полезны. В формате all expansions Venus карт в колоде немного, так что free draw Venus не так часто сработает. Скорее это 1 карта за ~1-2 MC каждый ход + occasional free Venus card.
Venus Orbital Survey.when_to_pick: Берём рано для engine value. Особенно хороша с Viron (двойной action). Ti payable снижает effective cost. Не берём если нет MC/ti на 21 MC инвестицию в gen 1-3.

Mars Nomads.name: Mars Nomads
Mars Nomads.economy: Cost 13+3=16 MC. No tags (penalty -3 to -5). Action: collect placement bonuses (~2-6 MC/use). Over 4-5 uses = 8-30 MC total value. High variance.
Mars Nomads.reasoning: Strong action card that collects placement bonuses repeatedly. In 3P harder to block than 2P but still very good if played early. The no-tag penalty hurts (-3 to -5). FieldMouse007 calls it strong; community consensus is it's great early, weak late. Map-dependent value with Elysium being best.
Mars Nomads.when_to_pick: Early game only. If drawn gen 3+ the value drops significantly. Best on maps with rich placement bonuses (Elysium).

Trade Envoys.name: Trade Envoys
Trade Envoys.economy: 6+3=9 MC for effect: +1 colony track step per trade. Each step ~2-4 MC value. With trading every gen: 2-4 MC-prod equivalent. With 2 trade fleets: doubled. No tags is a penalty (-3 to -5).
Trade Envoys.reasoning: One of the best colony support cards. FieldMouse007 confirms 'strong card, easily generates good value.' SoupsBane calculates ~4 trades to profit. jaminfine calls it 'one of the best economy cards around' comparing to Space Hotels. The no-tag penalty is real but the effect is worth it. Needs energy to trade. [CORRECTED: 77/B -> 70/B. +0.27 elo low for B-tier]
Trade Envoys.when_to_pick: When you can trade regularly. Very high priority if you have 2 trade fleets. Even with 1 fleet, excellent value.

Electro Catapult.name: Electro Catapult
Electro Catapult.economy: ~5 MC/action + 1 VP. Building тег. Req 17 O2.
Electro Catapult.reasoning: Отличная action карта с Building тегом. ~5 MC за action + 1 VP.

Astra Mechanica.name: Astra Mechanica
Astra Mechanica.economy: 7+3=10 MC за возврат 2 events. GIA replay = 4 TR = 28.4 MC. NRA replay = 5 TR = 35.5 MC. Даже Conscription replay = 16 MC rebate на след. карту. Ceiling 30-50+ MC value, floor = 10 MC science тег.
Astra Mechanica.reasoning: Одна из лучших карт в игре по мнению COTD community. zoukon: 'do not sleep on this card, it is one of the best cards in the game.' FieldMouse007 (key commenter): 'mostly pretty good, some excellent red cards make it extremely good.' icehawk84: 'If you're Ecoline with GIA and Deimos in your event pile, this could be winning on the spot.' Targets: Giant Ice Asteroid (4TR повторно!), NRA (5 TR), Solar Probe (card draw), Conscription (дисконт), Bribed Committee (2VP+4MC), Harvest, GHG Shipment. За 10 MC можно получить 20-30+ MC ценности, перезапуская сильные события. Science тег — бонус. В 3P take-that events (Virus, Sabotage) слабее чем в 1v1, но terraforming events (GIA, NRA, Deimos Down) = невероятная ценность. Без хороших событий в pile — просто 10 MC science тег, что ОК но не более.
Astra Mechanica.when_to_pick: Берём если есть хотя бы 1-2 сильных event в pile или в руке. Идеально с NRA, GIA, Deimos Down. Science тег помогает engine. Не берём без хороших event targets.

Cultural Metropolis.name: Cultural Metropolis
Cultural Metropolis.economy: 20+3=23 MC (steel) + 7 MC (energy-prod loss) = ~30 MC total. 3 MC-prod (15 MC gen1) + 2 delegates (10 MC) + city (10-16 MC) = 35-41 MC. Net +5-11 MC + tags.
Cultural Metropolis.reasoning: Одна из лучших city карт по benbever. За ~30 MC (steel payable) получаешь: 3 MC-prod (15 MC gen1), 2 delegates в 1 party (10 MC), city tile (10-16 MC), Building+City теги. Requirement: Unity ruling или 2 delegates there — управляемо. 2 delegates в 1 action = можно захватить Chairman + ruling bonus за 2 actions. Steel payable + Building/City теги для milestone/awards. Минус: -1 energy-prod (~7 MC) и requirement. Но benbever подробно показывает что карта отрабатывает себя. В 3P Turmoil delegates ценнее чем в 4P+.
Cultural Metropolis.when_to_pick: Берём когда Unity доступна или уже ruling. Лучше ранняя игра для MC-prod value. Steel dump в любое время. Delegates для political маневрирования в 3P.

Ice Moon Colony.name: Ice Moon Colony
Ice Moon Colony.economy: 23+3=26 MC (ti payable). Ocean (18 MC SP) + Colony (17 MC SP) = 35 MC. Savings = 9 MC. Space тег ~2 MC. Total value ~37 MC для 26 MC. Net +11 MC.
Ice Moon Colony.reasoning: По benbever: экономия 9 MC над стандартными проектами (ocean 18 MC + colony 17 MC = 35 MC за 26 MC). Обычная скидка на карты ~4 MC, эта карта даёт на 5 MC больше — отличная ценность. Space тег = ti payable. Non-event — тег остаётся. TFM stats: +1.54 elo — один из лучших показателей в батче. Все комментаторы единогласно хвалят. marekt14 сравнивает с Ice Asteroid (тоже 23 MC за 2 ocean equivalent), считает обе A-tier. Ослабевает в late game когда колонии менее ценны, но ocean наоборот растёт в цене.
Ice Moon Colony.when_to_pick: Берём рано для максимальной ценности colony + хороших ocean spots. Ti payable делает её ещё дешевле. Не берём если все хорошие колонии заняты и ocean spots плохие.

Media Group.name: Media Group
Media Group.economy: Cost 6+3=9 MC. Value: Earth tag (2-3) + 3 MC per event played. Breaks even at 3 events. After 5 events = +6 MC profit.
Media Group.reasoning: Excellent rebate card. Events are generally strong cards you want to play anyway, so this adds pure value. Breaks even after just 3 events, which is very achievable. shai_aus calls it great, especially early. ad_hocNC rates it solid B-tier. Earth tag adds synergy with Point Luna, Teractor, etc. [CORRECTED: 76/B -> 80/A. +0.88 elo, Desktop A]
Media Group.when_to_pick: Early game with events in hand. Even mid-game it's good if you expect 3+ more events. High draft priority.

Red Spot Observatory.name: Red Spot Observatory
Red Spot Observatory.economy: 17+3=20 MC (NO ti). 2 VP (8 MC mid) + 2 cards (7 MC) + tags (~7 MC Jovian+Science) = ~22 MC immediate. Action: 1 card/2 turns = ~1.75 MC/turn. За 4 gen action = ~7 MC. Total ~29 MC.
Red Spot Observatory.reasoning: benbever: 'good package deal IF playing science/Jovian engine.' DragonlordAtarka (22 upvotes): 'fantastic card, immediate payoff of 2 cards + 2 VP + dual premium tags.' Jovian+Science — два лучших тега в игре. 3 Science req — доступно для engine players к mid-game. Action: 2 floaters → draw 1 card (каждые 2 хода) или каждый ход с external floater source. Минус: нет Space тега — нельзя платить ti, что странно для Jovian карты (benbever отмечает). 20 MC без ti payment — дороговато. TFM stats: +0.56 elo — средне. Futuralis: 'not cheap, lacking space tag.' Реалистично: 2 VP + 2 cards + Jovian/Science tags + draw engine за 20 MC = хорошо, но не A-tier.
Red Spot Observatory.when_to_pick: Берём при science/Jovian engine, особенно с floater feeders. Dual premium tags отлично для Scientist award и Rim Settler. Не берём без 3+ science tags и без floater support.

Sub-Crust Measurements.name: Sub-Crust Measurements
Sub-Crust Measurements.economy: 20+3=23 MC (steel payable). 2 VP (~8 MC mid). Net engine cost ~15 MC. 1 card/turn = 3.5 MC/turn. Break-even ~4-5 turns. За 5 gen = ~17.5 MC card draw.
Sub-Crust Measurements.reasoning: shai_aus: 'off-brand AI Central, quite a bit worse.' Community в целом более позитивна — тройной тег (Science+Building+Earth), 2 VP, steel payable, нет energy cost. Сравнение с AI Central: AI Central даёт 2 cards/turn, Sub-Crust 1 card/turn. Но Sub-Crust дешевле на energy-prod (~9.7 MC), имеет 3 тега вместо 1, даёт 2 VP, и payable steel. MelchiorBarbosa: '13 MC card draw engine после вычета VP.' Point Luna synergy с Earth тегом. Req 2 Science — легче чем AI Central's 3 Science + 1 energy-prod. Не дотягивает до AI Central по raw power, но более доступна и имеет больше synergy value.
Sub-Crust Measurements.when_to_pick: Берём при science engine когда нужен card draw и нет AI Central. Triple тег делает её полезной для milestones (Builder, Scientist). Steel payable — хорошо для steel-heavy builds.

Birds.name: Birds
Birds.economy: 10+3=13 MC. 3 VP self (gen7 play, 2 gen left) = ~12 MC mid value. С Large Convoy: 7 VP = ~28 MC. Effective rate 1.86-4.3 MC/VP. -2 plant-prod = bonus ~4-8 MC swing.
Birds.reasoning: icehawk84: 'ridiculously strong in many situations, speculate on it almost every time.' benbever: 'very good, can be worth a lot of VP, especially if temperature far behind oxygen.' shai_aus: 'situational, usually 1-2 gens from end.' Реально: 13% O2 = gen 6-8 обычно. Самостоятельно 2-4 VP. С animal placers (Large Convoy +4, Imported Nitrogen +2) — ceiling 6-8 VP. -2 plant-prod — free bonus, не take-that penalty (это бонус а не core value карты). В 3P animal placement cards конкурентны — не гарантированы. TFM stats: +0.7 elo, массово играется. Solidный B-tier. Не A из-за requirement timing и зависимости от animal placers для high ceiling.
Birds.when_to_pick: Берём при animal placement cards в engine или когда O2 опережает temperature. Speculate в start hand если есть Large Convoy или Inventrix. В 3P с all expansions — O2 часто быстрый, что даёт Birds window.

Ganymede Colony.name: Ganymede Colony
Ganymede Colony.economy: 20 MC (ti payable) + 3 MC card = 23 MC cost. Returns: city tile + 1 VP per Jovian tag. With 4-5 Jovian tags: 4-5 VP (~20-25 MC late) + Space+Jovian tags (~6 MC). Total ~26-31 MC.
Ganymede Colony.reasoning: The premier Jovian VP multiplier card. In a Jovian-focused game with 4-5 tags, this yields 4-5 VP for 23 MC which is excellent. The city on reserved area means guaranteed placement but no adjacency VP. Ti payable via Space tag. Per COTD consensus, it's the capstone card for Jovian strategies. Even with 3 Jovian tags (including itself), 3 VP for 23 MC is acceptable. The city counts for Mayor. [CORRECTED: 75/B -> 78/B. Desktop A, VP per Jovian]
Ganymede Colony.when_to_pick: Late game with 3+ Jovian tags. The more Jovian tags you have, the higher priority.

Ice Asteroid.name: Ice Asteroid
Ice Asteroid.economy: 23 MC + 3 MC card = 26 MC for 2 oceans (2 TR = ~14-15 MC + ~6-8 MC placement bonuses = ~20-23 MC value). Space tag for ti payment. Event tag synergies.
Ice Asteroid.reasoning: Solid space event that places 2 oceans efficiently. With placement bonuses and titanium payment, this is often good value. Great for accelerating game end or grabbing ocean spots. Arctic Algae synergy is excellent. Earth/Space event tags provide discount opportunities. One of the better ocean-placing cards in the game.
Ice Asteroid.when_to_pick: Early-mid game when ocean spots are still good. Excellent titanium dump. Great with Arctic Algae or ocean synergies.

Mass Converter.name: Mass Converter
Mass Converter.economy: 8+3=11 MC. 6 energy-prod = 58.2 MC (Colonies value). Discount: -2 MC на Space cards (ongoing). Net gain ~50+ MC если играется. Но 5 Science req = ~10 MC opportunity cost для последнего тега.
Mass Converter.reasoning: Krazyguy75: 'absurd, undervalued by 24 cost.' shai_aus: 'most efficient energy source, but 5 science is steep.' 6 energy-prod = 58.2 MC value за 11 MC + 5 science tags. Но 5 science tags — жёсткий requirement, доступен только в dedicated science engine к gen 4-6. Многие игры — не играбельна вовсе. Когда играбельна — game-changing: 6 energy → 3 temperature raises = 6 TR, или power-hungry cards, или colonies energy trades. shai_aus предупреждает: science players обычно хотят длинную игру, не помогай заканчивать раньше. TFM stats: +0.88 elo — хорошо. Понижаю с 80 до 79: requirement слишком жёсткий для гарантированного A-tier. В 30-40% игр 5 science tags недостижимы.
Mass Converter.when_to_pick: Берём только при dedicated science engine (4+ science tags уже или планируемо). Не спекулируй в start hand — 5 science слишком далеко. Если req met — instant play.

Mohole Area.name: Mohole Area
Mohole Area.economy: Cost 20+3=23 MC (steel payable). Value: 4 heat-prod (16 MC gen 1, but ~24 in quantified) + tile on ocean space + Building tag. Total ~26-30 MC. Net +3-7.
Mohole Area.reasoning: Best heat production card in the game. 4 heat-prod for 20 MC steel-payable is excellent. The tile on ocean space gives placement bonuses and map control. shai_aus, ad_hocNC, and icehawk84 all rate it highly. Great for Robotic Workforce copy. Enables 1 temperature raise every 2 gens. Must play gen 1-2 for full value.
Mohole Area.when_to_pick: Gen 1-2 as terraforming anchor. Steel payable makes it very efficient. Late game it's too slow.

Quantum Communications.name: Quantum Communications
Quantum Communications.economy: 8+3=11 MC + 1 VP. 6 MC-prod (avg 3P) = 34.2 MC gen1 value. Но played gen 4-5 realistically: 4 gens left = 24 MC. No-tag penalty -4 MC. Net ~20 MC + 1 VP.
Quantum Communications.reasoning: DragonlordAtarka: 'super cheap 6 MC-prod, really dumb card with no business being so cheap.' Futuralis: 'insane if colonies are spammed, fine if not.' 4 Science req — жёсткий, доступен к gen 4-6. No tags = -3/-5 penalty. В 3P с хорошими колониями (Luna, Ceres, Pluto): 6-9 colonies in play к mid-game = 6-9 MC-prod за 11 MC = невероятная value. Но: no tags, 4 science requirement, зависимость от colony usage. TFM stats: +1.38 elo — сильно. Понижаю с 80 до 78: no-tag penalty (-4 MC) и requirement ограничивают. В играх без активных колоний — 3-4 MC-prod max, что нормально но не outstanding.
Quantum Communications.when_to_pick: Берём в colony-heavy games при 4+ science tags. Идеально gen 3-5 когда 5-7 колоний уже на столе. Не берём в colony-light games или без science engine. 1 VP — приятный бонус.

Trees.name: Trees
Trees.economy: 13+3=16 MC. 3 plant-prod = 27.3 MC gen1. Played gen 3: 6 gen × 3 plants = 18 plants = ~2 greeneries + partial. Total value ~22-25 MC mid-game. Plant тег ~2 MC.
Trees.reasoning: icehawk84: 'very good, not quite as strong as Kelp Farming.' shai_aus: 'great, can make 2+ greeneries.' 3 plant-prod = 27.3 MC gen1 value за 16 MC = отличный rate (5.33 MC/plant-prod). -4°C requirement доступен к gen 2-4 обычно (temperature часто растёт быстро). Plant тег полезен для NRA, Ecologist, Insects combo. +1 plant — minor bonus. TFM stats: +0.69 elo — среднее. В WGT формате игры ~9 gen: если played gen 3, то 6 gen plant-prod = ~3 greeneries (24 plants) + oxygen TR. Не A-tier из-за requirement timing (gen 2-4 minimum) и того что plant-prod уязвима к asteroids.
Trees.when_to_pick: Берём в gen 1-4 при быстром temperature. Отлична с Ecoline, NRA, Insects combo. Не берём late game — plant-prod бесполезна в gen 8-9.

Red Ships.name: Red Ships
Red Ships.economy: 2+3=5 MC total. Average late game value per action: 5.8 MC. Per gen (if 2 actions): depends on timing. За 5 gen: ~25-30 MC total value. Minus no-tag penalty (-4 MC). Net ~21-26 MC.
Red Ships.reasoning: benbever: 'REALLY cheap for the amount of MC you can get. 5.8 MC on average late game.' CaptainCFloyd: 'almost always good and basically free money.' 5 MC total (2+3) — дешевейшая action карта. В 3P больше city и special tiles = больше MC. benbever анализирует 12 фото турниров: 4-10 тайлов next to ocean, среднее 5.8 MC. Но: no tags (-4 MC penalty), 4% O2 req (обычно gen 2-3). Stall value — 2 extra actions per gen. Даже last gen play = 4-6 MC free money. С Earth Catapult/Anti-Gravity = ещё лучше. Sagitta = +4 MC bonus. Проблема: нет тегов, что серьёзно в all-expansions формате. Держу на 75 — cheap and effective но no-tag penalty ограничивает.
Red Ships.when_to_pick: Берём почти всегда — 5 MC за ongoing MC engine. Лучше в 3P+ (больше тайлов на доске). Не берём только если hand очень tight и нужны теги для milestones. Draft priority высокий из-за cheap ceiling.

Atalanta Planitia Lab.name: Atalanta Planitia Lab
Atalanta Planitia Lab.economy: 10+3=13 MC. 2 VP (8 MC mid) + 2 cards (7 MC) + Venus тег (~3 MC) + Science тег (~4 MC) = ~22 MC. Net gain ~9 MC.
Atalanta Planitia Lab.reasoning: benbever (17 upvotes): 'excellent value, 2 cards + 2 VP + 2 useful tags for very good price.' SoupsBane: 'strong science tag feed.' icehawk84: 'one of the better engine cards in Venus deck, not quite Research.' Сравнение: Research = 14 MC за 2 cards + 2 Science tags. Atalanta = 13 MC за 2 cards + 2 VP + Science+Venus tags. Лучше Research по VP, чуть хуже по engine (Venus тег < Science тег для engine). 3 Science req — доступен к mid-game. CaptainCFloyd: 'a random card is worth at least 4 MC.' Итого: 2 VP (~8 MC) + 2 cards (~7 MC) + tags (~5 MC) = 20 MC за 13 MC. Повышаю с 74 до 77 — benbever убедительно показывает excellent value.
Atalanta Planitia Lab.when_to_pick: Берём при 2+ science tags уже есть. Отличная для mid-game science engine feed. Venus тег помогает с Venuphile и Diversifier. Не берём без science engine support.

Big Asteroid.name: Big Asteroid
Big Asteroid.economy: 27+3=30 MC for 2 temp TR (14 MC) + 4 ti (12 MC) + remove 4 plants. Net cost ~15 MC for 2 TR. Ti-payable. Event synergies.
Big Asteroid.reasoning: Strong space event for rushers. After ti cashback, the effective cost is ~15 MC for 2 temperature TR, which is excellent (7.5 MC/TR). Great combo with Deimos Down for massive temperature pushes. Ti-payable, event tag triggers Media Group, IC, Optimal Aerobraking. The 4 plant removal is a nice bonus. One of the better asteroid events.
Big Asteroid.when_to_pick: Most games when rushing temperature. Higher priority with ti discount/event rebates. Good for sniping ocean bonus at -24C.

Field-Capped City.name: Field-Capped City
Field-Capped City.economy: 29+3=32 MC (steel payable). 2 MC-prod (11.4 MC gen1) + 1 energy-prod (9.7 MC) + 3 plants (~6 MC) + 3 tags (~3 MC) + city (10-16 MC) = 40-46 MC. Net +8-14 MC.
Field-Capped City.reasoning: benbever: 'one of the best city cards, good value for money, can play early/mid/late.' shai_aus: 'good, like a cheaper Domed Crater.' Ключевое преимущество: ДАЁТ energy-prod вместо того чтобы ТРАТИТЬ её (как большинство city cards). 3 тега (City+Building+Power) = excellent для milestones. 3 plants = может хватить для greenery если уже есть 5 plants. Steel payable. Но 29+3=32 MC — дорого в абсолютных числах. marekt14: 'mixed feelings, don't know when to use, 29 MC surely better used elsewhere.' Реалистично: benbever оценивает total value 35-41 MC за 32 MC, что хорошо но не great. Держу на 74.
Field-Capped City.when_to_pick: Берём рано для production value + city VP setup. Отличный steel dump. 3 тега помогают milestones (Builder, Energizer). Не берём если нет steel и money tight.

Fish.name: Fish
Fish.economy: 9+3=12 MC. 3 VP self (gen6 play, 3 gen left) = ~12 MC mid. С Large Convoy: 7 VP = 28 MC. Rate 1.7-4 MC/VP. -1 plant-prod = bonus ~2-4 MC swing.
Fish.reasoning: icehawk84: 'among the best animal cards.' shai_aus: 'maybe better than Birds, heat rises faster than O2.' FieldMouse007: 'pretty good, at least 2 VP if game doesn't end on +2°C turn.' +2°C requirement обычно met раньше чем 13% O2 (gen 5-7 vs gen 6-8), что даёт Fish чуть больше gens для accumulation. 9+3=12 MC — дешевле Birds (13 MC). -1 plant-prod (не -2 как Birds) — меньше attack/bonus. Animal тег для Ecologist. Самостоятельно 2-4 VP, с animal placers — ceiling 5-7 VP. TFM stats: +0.66 elo — среднее. Comparable to Birds, чуть дешевле и чуть раньше available, но weaker attack bonus.
Fish.when_to_pick: Берём когда temperature опережает oxygen (Fish available раньше Birds). С animal placement cards — must-pick. В 3P all-expansions heat часто быстрый из-за Turmoil/colonies.

GMO Contract.name: GMO Contract
GMO Contract.economy: 3 MC + 3 MC card = 6 MC cost. Effect: +2 MC when you play a plant, animal, or microbe tag. Greens ruling req. Science tag (~4 MC). With 4-6 bio tags after: 8-12 MC = great for 6 MC investment.
GMO Contract.reasoning: Excellent value in bio-tag strategies. At 6 MC cost, paying for itself with just 3 bio tags played afterward is easy. Per icehawk84 in Ecology Research COTD, with bio combos this can get completely out of hand. The Greens ruling requirement is manageable — Greens are often in power mid-game when you'd want to play this anyway. The Science tag adds value. A mini Earth Office for bio tags.
GMO Contract.when_to_pick: Gen 1-3 with planned bio-tag strategy and Greens accessible. Excellent return even with 3-4 future bio tags.

Homeostasis Bureau.name: Homeostasis Bureau
Homeostasis Bureau.economy: 16 MC + 3 MC card = 19 MC. 2 heat prod (~8 MC). Effect: gain MC back when spending heat for temp raises. With ~3-4 temp raises via heat = ~9-12 MC back. Building tag payable in steel.
Homeostasis Bureau.reasoning: Strong synergy card for heat-based terraforming. The 2 heat production alone is worth 8 MC, and the MC-back effect on temperature raises can generate significant value over the game. Works especially well when temp raises are abundant and you're actively pushing heat. The effect also works on asteroid-type cards that raise temp. Building tag for steel payment. Good floor, high ceiling.
Homeostasis Bureau.when_to_pick: Early game when planning to terraform via heat. Excellent gen 1-3 play. Loses value if temperature is already near max.

Lunar Exports.name: Lunar Exports
Lunar Exports.economy: 19+3=22 MC (ti payable). 5 MC-prod = 28.5 MC gen1, ~20 MC gen3. Earth тег (~3 MC) + Space тег (~2 MC) = ~5 MC tags. Total gen1: ~33.5 MC.
Lunar Exports.reasoning: Solid MC-prod card. 5 MC-prod за 22 MC = 4.4 MC/prod — выше среднего. Earth+Space теги ценны: ti payable, Point Luna, Teractor, Earth Office synergy. Dokurushi: 'never choose plant option.' EspritFort: 'perfectly suited for surprise Specialist milestone grab.' TFM stats: +1.44 elo — очень сильно, один из лучших в батче. Нет requirements — всегда playable. Plant mode почти никогда не correct (SP Greenery лучше). Минус: 5 MC-prod в gen 3+ уже менее ценно (~4 MC/prod). Но: Earth+Space dual тег + no req + ti payable = excellent flexibility. Понижаю с 80 до 79: чистая MC-prod без VP/TR компонента не дотягивает до A-tier threshold.
Lunar Exports.when_to_pick: Берём в gen 1-3 для economy. Ti payable делает карту особенно сильной с prelude titanium. Не берём в gen 6+ — MC-prod не успевает окупиться.

Meat Industry.name: Meat Industry
Meat Industry.economy: 5+3=8 MC (steel payable). Need 4 animal triggers для break-even. Per animal: +2 MC. Pets + 5 cities = 10 MC. Large Convoy = 8 MC. Ecological Zone ongoing = 2 MC per plant/animal card.
Meat Industry.reasoning: Krazyguy75: 'ceiling absurd — nearly every time it hits play, it breaks the game.' benbever: 'one of the best money cards, can earn a lot.' shai_aus: 'need 5 animals for payoff.' Cheap (5+3=8 MC, steel payable, Building тег). Floor очень низкий — без animal cards = 8 MC wasted. Ceiling огромный: Pets + cities = 2 MC per city, Ecological Zone = 2 MC per plant/animal card, Large Convoy = 8 MC. Но в 3P all-expansions: animal cards не гарантированы, и нужна конкретная комбинация. Krazyguy75 справедливо отмечает: когда playing, it's OP, но это selection bias. Понижаю с 74 до 73: floor слишком низкий для higher score.
Meat Industry.when_to_pick: Берём только при animal engine (Pets, Eco Zone, 1-VP animals). Cheap + Building тег = low risk если animal support есть. Не берём без animal cards в engine/hand.

Mining Area.name: Mining Area
Mining Area.economy: 4+3=7 MC. Ti spot: placement bonus +3 MC, ti-prod (14.25 MC gen1). Net cost ~4 MC для ~14 MC value = 3.5x return. Steel spot: placement +2 MC, steel-prod (9.1 MC gen1). Net cost ~5 MC для ~9 MC = 1.8x return.
Mining Area.reasoning: shai_aus: 'one of the best production cards in the game.' ad_hocNC: 'good if you can get it out without overreaching.' benbever: 'always keep and play, only 7 MC, placement bonus returns 2-3 MC.' На titanium spot: 4+3=7 MC, placement bonus +1 ti (3 MC), net cost ~4 MC для 1 ti-prod (14.25 MC value) = абсурдная эффективность. На steel: менее впечатляюще но всё равно хорошо (9.1 MC value). Requirement: need OWN tile adjacent to mineral spot — ограничивает early game play. Building тег + tile placement полезны для milestones/awards. TFM stats: +0.75 elo. Повышаю с 74 до 76: экономика слишком хорошая, даже с placement ограничением.
Mining Area.when_to_pick: Берём при tile adjacent to mineral spot. Ti spot >> steel spot. Mining Guild = S-tier synergy. Не берём если нет own tile near mineral spots и не планируешь ставить.

Robotic Workforce.name: Robotic Workforce
Robotic Workforce.economy: 9+3=12 MC. Science тег (~4 MC). Best targets: Mohole Area = 18.2 MC, Fusion Power = 29.1 MC, FCC = 21.1 MC. Worst: 1 steel-prod = 9.1 MC. Average target = ~12-15 MC production value.
Robotic Workforce.reasoning: benbever (28 upvotes): подробный список targets. shai_aus: 'sometimes great, more often just good, copies ALL production including costs.' Лучшие targets: Mohole Area (4 heat-prod, but heat-prod = 4.56 MC each = 18 MC), Fusion Power (+3 energy-prod = 29.1 MC), Field-Capped City (+2 MC-prod +1 energy-prod = 21.1 MC). Worst case: 12 MC science тег (1 ti-prod или 2 MC-prod). Science тег — ценный. Копирует negative production тоже (city cards с -1 energy-prod). TFM stats: +0.61 elo — средне. Wildly variable: от 12 MC science тег до 30+ MC value. В среднем ~15-20 MC value за 12 MC. Держу на 74.
Robotic Workforce.when_to_pick: Берём если есть strong building production card для copy. Science тег полезен для engine. Не берём если лучший target = 1-2 MC-prod (12 MC за science тег = ОК но не great).

Sulphur-Eating Bacteria.name: Sulphur-Eating Bacteria
Sulphur-Eating Bacteria.economy: 6+3=9 MC for ~3 MC equivalent production per gen (action: add microbe or cash out at 3 MC each). Venus+Microbe tags worth ~3-4 MC. With Enceladus colony: explosive income potential.
Sulphur-Eating Bacteria.reasoning: Effectively 3 MC-prod for 9 MC is excellent. icehawk84 says it can net 30-40 MC. FieldMouse007 notes it's much worse than real income because you must wait before cashing out. Enceladus colony makes this card broken. Venus 6% requirement limits early play but is usually achievable by gen 2-3 with WGT. [CORRECTED: 74/B -> 76/B. Desktop A]
Sulphur-Eating Bacteria.when_to_pick: Almost always when Venus 6% is met or close. Especially strong with Enceladus colony. Draft early, play when requirement is met.

Topsoil Contract.name: Topsoil Contract
Topsoil Contract.economy: 8+3=11 MC for 3 plants (6 MC) + effect: gain 1 MC per microbe added anywhere + Microbe+Earth tags (~4 MC). Base value 10 MC. With 2+ microbe actions/gen: 2+ MC-prod equivalent.
Topsoil Contract.reasoning: Excellent combo card. shai_aus gives high draft priority. The 3 plants + Earth tag already justify most of the cost. The microbe rebate effect can generate 10-40+ MC over a game with the right engine. icehawk84 says 'not very strong but 3 instant plants and a bio tag for 11 MC is not bad with synergies.' Strong with Enceladus. [CORRECTED: 74/B -> 76/B. Desktop A]
Topsoil Contract.when_to_pick: Almost always when you have or plan to have microbe generation. Even without, 3 plants + Earth tag is decent.

Open City.name: Open City
Open City.economy: 23+3=26 MC (steel payable) -1 energy-prod (9.7 MC) = ~36 MC total. 4 MC-prod (gen7: 2 gens × 5.7 = 11.4 MC) + city (10-16 MC) + 2 plants (~4 MC) = ~25-31 MC. Break-even in 3P с city VP.
Open City.reasoning: benbever: 'one of the best value for money city cards from base game, but harder to play because of requirement.' icehawk84: 'one of the best cities and best late-game steel dumps.' 12% O2 requirement = late game (gen 7-8). 4 MC-prod к тому моменту = ~8-12 MC value (2-3 gens left). City + 2 plants + VP. Steel payable. Некоторые комментаторы (Enter_Octopus, AReallyGoodName) менее энтузиастичны — late game MC-prod малоценна. Erikrtheread (solo player): 'C or C- most of the time.' Но в 3P cities ценнее чем в solo/2P. Holding cost в руке = ~3 MC opportunity. Понижаю с 74 до 73: 12% O2 приходит слишком поздно для MC-prod value.
Open City.when_to_pick: Берём при steel для late game dump + city VP. Не keep в start hand — 12% O2 слишком далеко. Подбирай в mid-game draft когда O2 приближается к 12%.

Sponsoring Nation.name: Sponsoring Nation
Sponsoring Nation.economy: 21+3=24 MC (no ti/steel). 3 TR (21.3 MC) + 2 delegates (~9 MC) + Earth тег (~3 MC) = ~33 MC. Net gain ~9 MC. Credicor discount = -4 MC.
Sponsoring Nation.reasoning: benbever: '24 MC для 3 TR уже decent, + 2 delegates (10 MC) = great value.' warpspeed100: 'placing 2 delegates with one action is the strongest part.' CaptainCFloyd: 'buying a delegate frequently worth a TR + 4MC from influence.' 3 TR = 21.3 MC. 2 delegates в 1 party = ~8-10 MC (можно захватить Chairman + ruling). Earth тег для Point Luna/Earth Office. Req 4 Earth tags — жёсткий, но Earth engine players к mid-game достигают. Нельзя платить ti или steel. Total: 21.3 + 8-10 + Earth тег (~3 MC) = 32-34 MC за 24 MC = хорошо. Держу на 74 — хорошая карта но 4 Earth req + no discount payment options ограничивают.
Sponsoring Nation.when_to_pick: Берём при Earth engine (4+ Earth tags). 2 delegates critical для political манёвров в 3P Turmoil. Хороша на Elysium (Celebrity + Benefactor). Не берём без Earth tags.

Algae.name: Algae
Algae.economy: 10+3=13 MC for 2 plant-prod (16 MC gen 1) + 1 plant (2 MC) + Plant tag (1-2 MC). Total ~19 MC. Excellent value at 5.5 MC/plant-prod.
Algae.reasoning: One of the best plant production cards. 2 plant-prod + 1 plant for only 13 MC is great value. The 5 ocean requirement is achievable gen 2-4 in 3P with preludes (ocean preludes are common). Plant tag enables NRA, Insects, Ecologist. The main risk is oceans being slow, making the card dead in hand. In 3P/WGT oceans usually come out reasonably fast.
Algae.when_to_pick: When 5 oceans will be met gen 2-4 and you want greeneries. Speculate early if ocean preludes are played.

Energy Market.name: Energy Market
Energy Market.economy: 3 MC + 3 MC card = 6 MC cost. Action: sell energy-prod for 8 MC or buy energy for 2 MC each. Power tag (~1 MC). With 3 excess energy-prod sold: 24 MC over last 3 gens.
Energy Market.reasoning: Extremely cheap card with surprisingly strong flexibility. Per FieldMouse007, the sell-energy-production action is the real strength — turning excess production into 8 MC per gen in the endgame is very efficient. Per benbever, enables great combos with Space Mirrors and Fusion Power. With Colonies, buying energy to trade is valuable. The Power tag is rare and occasionally needed. A classic 'underrated cheap action card.'
Energy Market.when_to_pick: Almost always worth picking up for 6 MC total cost. Especially good with Colonies or energy-heavy engines.

Frontier Town.name: Frontier Town
Frontier Town.economy: 11 MC (steel payable) + 3 MC card + ~7 MC energy prod = ~21 MC cost. Returns: city tile + 3x PRINTED placement bonus. Typical bonus ~12 MC (triple 2 plants or 2 steel). City+Building tags.
Frontier Town.reasoning: Incredible ceiling depending on map spot. Per benbever's exhaustive analysis, some maps have crazy spots — Elysium 9 plants (instant greenery), Terra Cimmeria 3 colonies for 15 MC, Vastitas 3 temperature raises. The Mars First requirement is manageable with 2 delegates. Average case: triple a 2-plant spot = 6 plants + city, which is strong. Below average case: 21 MC for a city + 6 MC bonus, which is fine.
Frontier Town.when_to_pick: Gen 1-3 with a strong printed placement bonus spot available. Check map before drafting.

Interplanetary Colony Ship.name: Interplanetary Colony Ship
Interplanetary Colony Ship.economy: 12+3=15 MC (ti payable). Colony SP = 17 MC. Base savings = 2 MC. С Earth Office: -3 MC = 12 MC total. С ti payment: effective cost ниже. Event tags для Media Group (+3) etc.
Interplanetary Colony Ship.reasoning: Стандартная colony card — дешевле SP colony на 2 MC (15 vs 17). Space+Earth event tags дают множество discount возможностей: Media Group, IC, Optimal Aerobraking, Earth Office и т.д. Ti payable. Все комментаторы единогласно: 'good, cheaper than SP, synergistic tags.' jaminfine: 'very efficient, amazing with discounts.' Но: это просто colony за дисконт — не exciting. Colony SP = 17 MC, ICS = 15 MC effective. С discounts gap увеличивается. TFM stats: +0.81 elo. Понижаю с 78 до 74: базовый savings всего 2 MC. Colony placement ценна в gen 1-3, менее так позже. Без discounts — marginal improvement over SP.
Interplanetary Colony Ship.when_to_pick: Берём когда нужна colony и есть tag discounts. Ti payable = хорошо с leftover titanium. Лучше в gen 1-3 когда colony spots доступны. Не берём если все нужные колонии уже есть.

Interstellar Colony Ship.name: Interstellar Colony Ship
Interstellar Colony Ship.economy: 24+3=27 MC + 5 science opportunity cost. 4 VP = 32 MC last gen. Break-even needs ~5 MC in discounts. Typical discount stack: Earth Office (-3), ti (-3-6), IC/Media (+2-3). Effective 15-20 MC для 4 VP.
Interstellar Colony Ship.reasoning: shai_aus: 'one of the best straight-up VP cards if collecting science tags.' Krazyguy75: 'overplayed, starting cost absurd — 37 MC equivalent for 4 VP (9.25 MC/VP).' ad_hocNC: 'raw, highly overpriced, exists as payoff for discounts and rebates.' benbever: extensive analysis shows it's rarely played at face value. С discounts: Earth Office (-3), ti payment (-savings), Media Group (+3), IC (+2), etc. — effective cost 10-15 MC для 4 VP = excellent. Но: requirement 5 Science = gen 6-8 обычно, когда VP worth more. Last-gen ti dump = primary use case. TFM stats: +0.57 elo — средне. Понижаю с 73 до 70: Krazyguy75 прав — даже с discounts, 4 VP for ~15 MC = 3.75 MC/VP, что ОК но не great. Need heavy discount stack для real value.
Interstellar Colony Ship.when_to_pick: Берём в last 1-2 gen при 5+ science tags и leftover titanium. Не keep ранее gen 5-6 — holding cost высокий. С discount stack — very strong last gen play.

Martian Media Center.name: Martian Media Center
Martian Media Center.economy: 7+3=10 MC (steel payable). 2 MC-prod (11.4 MC gen1) + delegate action savings (~2 MC/gen × 5 gen = 10 MC). Total value ~21.4 MC. Building тег ~2 MC.
Martian Media Center.reasoning: benbever: 'good card, 2 MC-prod + 3 MC delegates = earns back quickly.' warpspeed100: 'high impact card from party requirements.' MiddleCelery6616: 'amazing, functionally 4 MC-prod for 5 cost.' Mars First requirement — manageable, одна из популярных партий. Action: place delegate для 3 MC вместо 5 MC = savings 2 MC/gen. 2 MC-prod (11.4 MC gen1). Building тег + steel payable. Total effective: ~4 MC-prod equivalent (2 MC-prod + 2 MC savings). За 10 MC = 2.5 MC/prod = outstanding rate. Но: Mars First не всегда доступна, и delegate savings только если ставишь delegate каждый gen (что не всегда optimal). Futuralis: 'dubious at 4-5P prelude games.' В 3P — delegates impact выше. Держу на 73 — slightly below original.
Martian Media Center.when_to_pick: Берём когда Mars First ruling или легко доступна. Steel payable + Building тег хорошо для Builder. Delegate savings accumulate — лучше ранняя игра.

Stratospheric Birds.name: Stratospheric Birds
Stratospheric Birds.economy: 12+3=15 MC + 1 floater. 2-3 VP self (gen 7 play, 2-3 gens left) = 8-12 MC mid. С animal placers: 5-7 VP ceiling. Venus+Animal tags ~4 MC.
Stratospheric Birds.reasoning: Insanitarius-: 'solid 1 VP animal, comes online earlier than Venusian Animals, enables Freyja Biodomes.' Venus 12% + spend floater — двойной requirement.
